name: mass_gathering_yn
label: Did you participate in mass gatherings ?

name: no_hhd
label: How many household members do you living with ?

name: sick_hhd_yn
label: Do you have any household members with similar illness or symptoms ?

name: sick_comm_yn
label: Are you aware of people outside your household with similar illness or symptoms ?

name: contact_sym_yn
label: Did you had any contacts with a SYMPTOMATIC CASE ?

name: travel_hist_yn
label: Did you travel, outside your residential area, prior to symptoms onset ?

name: tradi_n_treat
label: Did you received care from traditional healer or other treatment ?

name: animal_exposure_yn
label: Were you in close proximity to any animals in the XX week/months prior to symptom onset?

name: animal_sick_sign
label: Was it dead sick or had an abortion ?

name: food_change
label: Was there any changes or significant events involving your SOURCE of food or drinks ?

name: food_unusual
label: Was there any changes or significant events involving your FOOD PRODUCT OR DRINKS, prior to symptoms onset ?

name: insect_bednet
label: Did you sleep under a bed net every night in the month prior to falling ill

name: insect_type
label: Did you notice any unusual insect lately ?

name: insect_qty
label: Did you notice unusual quantity of insect lately ?

name: atb_before
label: Did the patient received antibiotic prior to specimen collection?

name: presentation_date
label: Date first presented to health factility (DD/MM/YYYY): ___/___/_____

name: outcome
label: Outcome of illness (circle): still sick / cured / sequels / abandon / death

name: sympt_fever_onset
label: If febrile, date of fever onset:

name: sign_rash_onset
label: If present, date of rash onset (DD/MM/YYYY):

name: vac_yn
label: Did the patient received full vaccination course for the suspected disease?
